body.name: Kleenex Trusted Care Everyday Facial Tissues, Flat Box, 160 Count (Pack of 6)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 10 mins.
features: Contains 6 boxes with 160 Kleenex Trusted Care tissues per pack
The softest everyday tissue* (among national brands)
Face tissues are perfect for sniffles and sneezes, kids' messy faces and more
Tissue boxes available in a variety of colors and designs (may vary from image shown)
Buy tissue in bulk and save up to 15% with Subscribe & Save and keep tissues on hand for family, guests and yourself
Right-sized for living rooms, bathrooms, kitchens, offices and more
Be prepared during cold & flu season, allergy season, back-to-school and holidays
body.description: One soft tissue is all it takes to show you care. Reach for gentle Kleenex Trusted Care Tissues for a friend, a stranger or yourself. Durable 2-ply tissues have a combination of softness, strength and absorbency that locks in moisture. Our essential Kleenex facial tissues are perfect for makeup smudges, sniffles and sneezes, children’s messy faces and more. Just use and toss. Buy tissues in bulk and save! Keep tissues on hand for family, company and yourself during cold and flu season, allergy season, back-to-school and holidays. And as always, Kleenex Pack come in a variety of colors and designs that blend beautifully into your home décor. Place Pack in the living room, kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms and office. Kleenex disposable facial tissues have been there for happy tears and stuffy noses since 1924. Kimberly-Clark is proud to provide $4 million through May 31, 2020, to support World Wildlife Fund’s efforts to protect forests and other critical ecosystems. ‘WWF’ and ‘World Wildlife Fund’ are WWF Registered Trademarks. 1986 Panda Symbol WWF.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Everyday Softness Trusted Care has the perfect balance of softness, strength and absorbency for daily use. The Trusted Tissue Since 1924, Kleenex has provided the ultimate softness and strength for a gentle clean, every day. 2-Ply Durability 2-ply stands up to sniffles, sneezes, runny noses and even the occasional cry for joy. Use Them Everywhere These tissues aren't just for home. Bring them to school, work, or even in the car. Prints & Patterns Our flat box options feature soft watercolor textures and cool tones that complement every style. Next page 1 Everyday Softness 2 The Trusted Tissue 3 2-Ply Durability 4 Use Them Everywhere 5 Prints & Patterns

Compare Kleenex For Delicate Skin Kills Germs 3 ply 2 ply Safe for Glasses Cooling Relief For Delicate Skin Kills Germs 3 ply 2 ply Safe for Glasses Cooling Relief For Delicate Skin Kills Germs 3 ply 2 ply Safe for Glasses Cooling Relief

Are these cube or rectangular flat boxes? These are rectangular flat boxes. What are the dimensions of the tissue and box? Each tissue measures 8.2 x 8.4in and each box is 3.5 x 8.9 x 4.7in Where are Kleenex Trusted Care tissues made? Our tissues are manufactured in the United States. Can I recycle Kleenex boxes? Yes! Cartons can go in curbside recycling along with paper. The small plastic window can be kept on carton, they are removed during the paper recycling process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is familiar. Good price and convenient delivery.
reviews.reviewText: The product is well known, so no need to review. Well packaged and came on predicted date. There was a little thank you for your order note. Cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These handsome multiple Kleenex boxes arrived quickly and in good condition. The woman who runs the business is quite impressive -- especially in a cut-throat corporate world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kleenex Facial Tissues
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite tissues to buy. They are nice and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using Kleenex for years because it doesn't shred in the washing machine like other tissues. Never gets all over the dark clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Popup feature seems to stop half way through the stack. It is a challenge to get it started again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We go through a lot of tissues, especially this time of year. It's great being able to find a way to buy in bulk and at a very good price! Very happy with the company that sends these. They arrive quickly so I never run out. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t dispense tissues properly
reviews.reviewText: This is the second carton of six boxes that was defective. The plastic piece at the top that dispenses the tissues one at the time was not attached on three sides making the dispenser useless. I had to open the box, take out the tissues, tape the three unattached sides, and tape up the side I opened. EACH AND EVERY BOX!I have always used Kleenex for 70 years. I may have to switch brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recommend this seller.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived timely and well-packaged, product exactly as described. Thank you for the excellent product and service!
Although they came loose I must tell these are one of the best on the market klinex.
